data.title: Gloria Gaynor
data.meta_description: Gloria Gaynor, known for her hit "I Will Survive," recorded an album entitled "Christmas Presence" with Solar Music in 2007.
data.text:
Gloria Gaynor, long known for her hit single “I Will Survive,” released a Christmas album entitled “Christmas Presence” in 2007 which was produced and arranged by the Solar Music team.

The sessions included traditional holiday songs including God Rest Ye Merry Gentleman, Frosty the Snowman, Joy To The World, O Holy Night and many others. The treatments of these classics features arrangements in many every genres of music, with a large cast of musicians.
